name: Break Time-The Game
description:
Hate office life? Want to rebel from an awful boss in a fun and satisfying way? Break Time is the game for you!

Break time is a 2D side scroller beat 'em up game where you're fighting your way through the office to take down the evil corporate overlord. The player will defeat enemies on each floor in order to progress to the next level. While you have your fists to fight, you must make use of your surroundings to gain the upper hand in combat. Grab tables, chairs, computers and many more office supplies to fight back the waves of corporate drones to teach that evil overlord a lesson!

Our team of 4 has produced this Indie game within a month and plan on using the current levels as a foundation and expanding this game further on.

You can contact us at:
